faqList.question: Is Knives Out Mobile heavy on phones?
faqList.answer: Yes, especially in full squad matches. Devices with 4GB+ RAM and decent GPU work best.

faqList.question: Can my phone run Knives Out at 60 FPS?
faqList.answer: Only mid-range or high-end devices can handle 60+ FPS with Ultra settings. Low-end devices may struggle.

faqList.question: Why does my phone heat up during Knives Out?
faqList.answer: Particle effects, explosions, and map details make your phone work hard. Close apps and stay cool ğŸ˜….
